# Karanjeet Singh

> Staff Machine Learning Engineer at Apple. Founding member of Apple Intelligence.

## About

Karanjeet Singh is a Staff Machine Learning Engineer at Apple, where he focuses on building large-scale machine learning systems for information extraction and curation.

## Links

- Website: https://karanjeetsingh.ai/
- Google Scholar: https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=T9IoM-8AAAAJ&hl=en
- GitHub: https://github.com/karanjeets
- LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/singhkaranjeet/
- Apache: https://people.apache.org/phonebook.html?uid=karanjeet

## Selected Publications

- Beyond a Single Extractor: Re-thinking HTML-to-Text Extraction for LLM Pretraining. J. Li, J. P. Gardner, D. Kang, F. Shi, K. Singh, et al. EACL 2026.
- Apple Intelligence Foundation Language Models: Tech Report 2025. E. Li, A. B. L. Larsen, ...K. Singh... et al. Apple, 2025.
- MM1: Methods, Analysis & Insights from Multimodal LLM Pre-training. B. McKinzie, Z. Gan, ...K. Singh... et al. ECCV 2024.
- Apple Intelligence Foundation Language Models. T. Gunter, Z. Wang, ...K. Singh... et al. Apple ML Research, 2024.
- Mars Target Encyclopedia: Rock and Soil Composition Extracted from the Literature. K. Wagstaff, R. Francis, T. Gowda, Y. Lu, E. Riloff, K. Singh, N. Lanza. AAAI, 2018.
- An Automated Approach for Information and Referral of Social Services Using Machine Learning. M. Sharan, N. K. Ottilingam, C. A. Mattmann, K. Singh, et al. IEEE IRI, 2017.

## Open Source

- Apache Nutch — Committer & PMC Member. A highly extensible and scalable open-source web crawler built on Apache Hadoop.
- Apache DRAT — Committer & PMC Member. A Distributed Release Audit Tool that automates license header checking and code compliance analysis.
- Sparkler — Co-Inventor. A distributed web crawler on Apache Spark.
